Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Dialog

Class EndGameDialog

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Dialog.Dialog
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Dialog.EndGameDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Serializable
public class EndGameDialog extends Dialog implements Observable
Dialog that shows the Final Points acquired by each Player. For each Player it will show the following Points: - Initial Points (the ones accumulated throughout the match) - Secret Objective Points - Common Objective 1 Points - Common Objective 2 Points - Total Points (the total sum).

One or more Players are chosen as Winner(s) by the Server. These Players will be highlighted in a yellow, slightly bigger card/box, and will show a "WINNER!" tag under their Total Points. Additionally, if the GUIController that created this Dialog belongs to one of the Winner Players, this Dialog will handle a winning animation, consisting of a number of confetti falling through the Screen.

See Also:

      Constructor Method

      title - a String that will be shown at the top of the Dialog, as a Title
      isDismissible - a boolean value that defines if the Dialog can be closed without picking a Card
      points - an ArrayList containing the info to show in this Dialog
      controller - the GUIController that created this Dialog
